H0.text: Who created the Miss World pageant. Julia Morley

H1.text: Who created the Miss World pageant. Donald Trump

H2.text: Who created the Miss World pageant. Bob Hope

H3.text: Who created the Miss World pageant. Eric Morley

A4.text: Miss World was created by Eric Morley in 1951.

A5.text: Since his death in 2000, Morley's widow, Julia Morley, has chaired the pageant.
